name: Redefining Race:  Asian American Panethnicity and Shifting Ethnic Boundaries
description: Speaker: Dina Okamoto, Associate Professor of Sociology and Director, Center for Research on Race and Ethnicity in Society, Indiana University.  This research provides insights about the conditions and mechanisms that encourage distinct ethnic, linguistic, and cultural groups to widen their boundaries to generate a new, collective identity â€“ a concept and process referred to as panethnicity.
